sku.Description: The resource model definition representing SKU

properties.Description: The properties of a private cloud resource

managementCluster.Description: The properties of a default cluster

internet.Description: Connectivity to internet is enabled or disabled. Possible values include: 'Enabled', 'Disabled'

identitySources.Description: vCenter Single Sign On Identity Sources

provisioningState.Description: The provisioning state. Possible values include: 'Succeeded', 'Failed', 'Cancelled', 'Pending', 'Building', 'Deleting', 'Updating'

networkBlock.Description: The block of addresses should be unique across VNet in your subscription as well as on-premise. Make sure the CIDR format is conformed to (A.B.C.D/X) where A,B,C,D are between 0 and 255, and X is between 0 and 22

managementNetwork.Description: Network used to access vCenter Server and NSX-T Manager

provisioningNetwork.Description: Used for virtual machine cold migration, cloning, and snapshot migration

vmotionNetwork.Description: Used for live migration of virtual machines

vcenterPassword.Description: Optionally, set the vCenter admin password when the private cloud is created

nsxtPassword.Description: Optionally, set the NSX-T Manager password when the private cloud is created

vcenterCertificateThumbprint.Description: Thumbprint of the vCenter Server SSL certificate

nsxtCertificateThumbprint.Description: Thumbprint of the NSX-T Manager SSL certificate

provisioningState.Description: The state of the cluster provisioning. Possible values include: 'Succeeded', 'Failed', 'Cancelled', 'Deleting', 'Updating'

name.Description: The name of the identity source

baseUserDN.Description: The base distinguished name for users

baseGroupDN.Description: The base distinguished name for groups

ssl.Description: Protect LDAP communication using SSL certificate (LDAPS). Possible values include: 'Enabled', 'Disabled'

username.Description: The ID of an Active Directory user with a minimum of read-only access to Base DN for users and group

password.Description: The password of the Active Directory user with a minimum of read-only access to Base DN for users and groups.

expressRouteID.Description: Identifier of the ExpressRoute Circuit (Microsoft Colo only)

nsxtManager.Description: Endpoint for the NSX-T Data Center manager

vcsa.Description: Endpoint for Virtual Center Server Appliance

hcxCloudManager.Description: Endpoint for the HCX Cloud Manager

sku.Description: The resource model definition representing SKU

provisioningState.Description: The state of the cluster provisioning. Possible values include: 'Succeeded', 'Failed', 'Cancelled', 'Deleting', 'Updating'

properties.Description: The properties of an HCX Enterprise Site

status.Description: The status of the HCX Enterprise Site. Possible values include: 'Available', 'Consumed', 'Deactivated', 'Deleted'

properties.Description: The properties of an ExpressRoute Circuit Authorization resource

provisioningState.Description: The state of the  ExpressRoute Circuit Authorization provisioning. Possible values include: 'Succeeded', 'Failed', 'Updating'

expressRouteAuthorizationId.Description: The ID of the ExpressRoute Circuit Authorization

expressRouteAuthorizationKey.Description: The key of the ExpressRoute Circuit Authorization
